alert.note: Alert for Ouachita; Union (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 16 at 3:28AM CDT until June 16 at 4:15AM CDT by NWS Shreveport
info.description: The National Weather Service in Shreveport has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Union Parish in north central Louisiana... Northern Ouachita Parish in north central Louisiana... * Until 415 AM CDT. * At 328 AM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 13 miles east of Cooley to near Farmerville to 7 miles west of Claiborne, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Monroe, Swartz, Farmerville, Sterlington, Marion, Downsville, Fairbanks, Perryville, Loch Lomon, Spencer, Haile, Linville, Bayou D Arbonne Lake, Rocky Branch, Guthrie, Deshard, Cecil and Litroe. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
